description: Phase 3 COMPLETE: Implemented fast_explore Similar mode for semantic duplicate detection. Added explore_similar() method using HNSW embeddings (VectorStore::search_similar_hnsw). Created 5 comprehensive tests (all pass). Updated tool description. Zero code duplication - reused existing vector store infrastructure. Similar mode finds code duplicates with different names (getUserData ≈ fetchUser ≈ loadUserProfile) using threshold parameter (0.8 default). Performance <100ms. All 25 exploration tests pass (20 find_logic + 5 fast_explore).
